lead_paragraph: Atlantic City is expected to slash a bond sale by 71 percent to $40 million because the multitude of uncertainties facing the city have made it difficult to borrow, a city official told Reuters on Wednesday.

headline.main: Exclusive: Atlantic City, N.J. to Slash Bond Deal, Sell Casino Tax Liens
headline.print_headline: Exclusive: Atlantic City, N.J. to Slash Bond Deal, Sell Casino Tax Liens

snippet: Atlantic City is expected to slash a bond sale by 71 percent to $40 million because the multitude of uncertainties facing the city have made it difficult to borrow, a city official told Reuters on Wednesday....
